H0.text: what is the milwaukee brewers mascot. Bernie Brewer

H1.text: what is the milwaukee brewers mascot. Brewster

H2.text: what is the milwaukee brewers mascot. Miller

H3.text: what is the milwaukee brewers mascot. Bonnie Brewer

A4.text: Bernie Brewer is the official mascot for the Milwaukee Brewers baseball team.

A5.text: He was joined by a companion Bonnie Brewer, who playfully swatted at the backside of the opposing team's third base coach with a broom as the field crew swept the base paths.
